perturbation.original_text: 1.1  Subject to the provisions of this Agreement, Airspan hereby appoints Distributor as an independent, exclusive distributor to assist Airspan in marketing the Airspan Products to customers in the Territory, and Distributor hereby accepts such appointment as of the Effective Date of this Agreement. Distributor's appointment as a distributor of the Airspan Products grants to Distributor only a license to resell the
perturbation.changed_text: 1.1  Subject to the provisions of this Agreement, Airspan hereby appoints Distributor as an independent distributor to assist Airspan in marketing the Airspan Products to customers in the Territory, and Distributor hereby accepts such appointment as of the Effective Date of this Agreement. Distributor's appointment as a distributor of the Airspan Products grants to Distributor only a license to resell the
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the distributor is an "exclusive distributor", implying a monopoly within the territory. By removing the word 'exclusive', the agreement now allows Airspan to appoint other distributors in the same territory, contradicting the initial clause. This introduces uncertainty about the distributor's competitive advantage.

perturbation.original_text: 7.1  Airspan will issue an invoice (the "Invoice") to Distributor in accordance with the payment terms below. The Invoice specifically will identify the Equipment, Software, or other items shipped, and the Contract Price of such items.  Any Installation Services or other services provided by Airspan will be invoiced separately following completion of such services.  The Invoice also shall state the total due to Airspan from Distributor (the "Invoice Total"), which shall include the Contract Price, and any applicable taxes, duties, and other fees due pursuant to Section 6 of this Agreement. Payment of the Invoice Total is due (without any right of set-off) Net forty-five (45) days after the date of invoice.
perturbation.changed_text: 7.1  Airspan will issue an invoice (the "Invoice") to Distributor in accordance with the payment terms below. The Invoice specifically will identify the Equipment, Software, or other items shipped, and the Contract Price of such items.  Any Installation Services or other services provided by Airspan will be invoiced separately following completion of such services.  The Invoice also shall state the total due to Airspan from Distributor (the "Invoice Total"), which shall include the Contract Price, and any applicable taxes, duties, and other fees due pursuant to Section 6 of this Agreement. Payment of the Invoice Total is due (without any right of set-off) Net sixty (60) days after the date of invoice.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies that payment is due within 45 days. By changing this to 60 days, this contradicts the initial payment terms. This will cause uncertainty and disagreement over the actual time the distributer has to submit payment.

perturbation.original_text: 13.1  This Agreement shall remain in effect for sixty (60) months from the Effective Date (the "Initial Term"). After the Initial Term, the term of the Agreement may be extended by a further period of five (5) years by mutual written agreement by the parties in the form of an amendment to this Agreement. If Distributor wishes to extend the term of the Agreement beyond the Initial Term, it  must notify Airspan in writing at least six (6) months prior to then end of the Initial Term. However, nothing contained herein shall be interpreted as requiring either party to renew or extend this Agreement.  Notwithstanding the provisions of this section or of any other provisions of this Agreement, this Agreement may be terminated prior to the expiration of its stated term as set forth below.
perturbation.changed_text: 13.1  This Agreement shall remain in effect for sixty (60) months from the Effective Date (the "Initial Term"). After the Initial Term, the term of the Agreement may be extended by a further period of five (5) years at Airspan's discretion. If Distributor wishes to extend the term of the Agreement beyond the Initial Term, it  must notify Airspan in writing at least six (6) months prior to then end of the Initial Term. However, nothing contained herein shall be interpreted as requiring either party to renew or extend this Agreement.  Notwithstanding the provisions of this section or of any other provisions of this Agreement, this Agreement may be terminated prior to the expiration of its stated term as set forth below.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the agreement can be extended for an additional 5 years upon "mutual written agreement". By changing this to "at Airspan's discretion", this removes the distributor's power and gives full control to Airspan. This causes conflict because it goes against the original mutual terms.
